part.content: CHAPTER II : THE CENTRAL AND STATE BOARDS FOR PREVENTION AND CONTROL OF WATER POLLUTION. Sec. 3 - 12.
CHAPTER IV : POWERS AND FUNCTIONS OF BOARDS. Sec. 16 - 18.
CHAPTER V : PREVENTION AND CONTROL OF WATER POLLUTION. Sec. 19 - 33.
CHAPTER VI : FUNDS, ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT. Sec. 34 - 40.
CHAPTER VII : PENALTIES AND PROCEDURE. Sec. 41 - 50.
